author: wddgit
body:
Migrate 2 DQM modules to call consumes. Both need
JetCorrectors. This modifies them to get them from
the Event instead of from the EventSetup as has been
done for other modules.

Plus there are changes to ensure needed JetCorrector
producers are run in the RECO configuration sequences.
title: Consumes migration, ExoticaDQM & HWWAnalyzer
